meta.description: Maximize profit from planting crops on a farm.

sets.name: CROPS
sets.description: Types of crops to be planted

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per acre for each crop

params.name: total_area
params.description: Total area of the farm in acres

vars.name: area
vars.description: Area of land used for each crop in acres

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[c] * area[c] for c in CROPS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from all crops

constraints.name: total_area_constraint
constraints.description: Total area used must not exceed the farm's total area

constraints.name: corn_wheat_constraint
constraints.description: Area for corn must be at least twice the area for wheat

constraints.name: soybeans_sorghum_constraint
constraints.description: Area for soybeans must be at least half the area for sorghum

constraints.name: wheat_sorghum_constraint
constraints.description: Area for wheat must be three times the area for sorghum
